body:
Many of the single player levels in both Jedi Outcast and Jedi Academy are frequently confusing. Try to improve the level design to make solutions easier to find:

- ensure consistent textures to distinguish breakable and non-breakable surfaces (glass, grates etc.)
- draw attention to important elements of environmental puzzles
- retrofit force sight into Jedi Outcast as a hint system? (Show button-door-connections etc.)
- possibly prevent players from backtracking away from a puzzle they need to solve

Of course, this depends on having a level editor (see #19)
title: overhauled vanilla campaigns
